[m]Sorry! Unable to access gifting. Please try again later.

[m]In Tetris Battle, you control the pieces
with the keyboard. 

 Watch the animation carefully to see
how it works.

[m]Drop your block on top of the bomb to
clear the garbage lines! 

 Clearing garbage lines will also send
garbage lines to the opponents.
[m]Clear at least 2 or more lines to send line attacks to your opponent.
[m]Clear 4 lines at once to perform a Tetris. \nThis will send a total of 4 lines to the opponent!
[m]You can force your opponent to block out by continuously sending line attacks, \nresulting in a KO
[m]You can send extra lines when you clear lines consecutively (combo). \n\n Higher Combos will send even more lines!
[m]Experience a different way to battle with predefined starting blocks.
[m]Only the targeted person will receive your line attacks. Hence, more Kos can be earned by focusing on a single person.
[m]First person to clear 40 lines will win the game. Focus on being the quickest in clearing the lines.
[m]The blue bar on the left shows how many lines are left to be cleared.
[m]Winning a game will earn you a star. stars are used to rank up and meet harder players.
[m]If you lose all your stars, you will rank down. If you earn 5 stars, you will rank up.
[m]Get a high score before the game ends.
[m]Or when your stack blocks out higher than the playing field.
[m]Clear the required number of lines to level up.
[m]As you level up, blocks will fall faster and the required lines will increase
[m]Earn more bonus points by clearing multiple lines at once.
[m]Special moves like Tetris or T-Spins will help you earn even more bonus points!
[m]Clear 40 lines as fast as you can.
[m]You will lose the game if your stack blocks out higher than the playing field.

[m]Use the arrow keys on the keyboard to move the Tetrimino.
[m]You can hold a Tetrimino for later use by pressing [Shift] or [C].
[m]Press [Space Bar] to instantly drop the Tetrimino and lock it down.
[m]Clear 2 or more lines to send a line attack to the opponent.
[m]Drop a Tetrimino on top of a Bomb Mino to explode it.
